awd_abstract_narration: This interagency agreement provides for the use of the facilities               at the Division of Computer Research and Technology, NIH.  We                   will use the Statistical Analysis System to aid in the analysis                 of several databases for internal projects requested by the                     Executive Office of the President, the Congress, the National                   Science Board, and the Office of the Director, NSF.  The                        mainframe computer system at NIH will be used by PRA to:                                                                                                        - develop and store large archival databases;                                   - manipulate the large files to obtain databases tailored to                    specific analysis requirements; and                                             - download these analysis databases to the PRA computer system.                                                                                                 Access is obtained through remote hookup using the PRA system.
